DOC.brief_summary: In a prospective study the investigators perform repeated cholangioscopies in all patients that received percutaneous transhepatic biliary drainage (PTBD) for a variety of malignant and benign diseases. Endoscopic findings and their correlation with clinical features will be recorded prospectively. The impact on clinical decision will be evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: Value of Percutaneous Cholangioscopy After Placement of a Percutaneous Transhepatic Biliary Drainage
DOC.criteria: PTBD with at least 14 French in diameter missing informed consent
